com.langtonsant.application.element.grid

Interface IGrid

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Vector2>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InfiniteGrid

    public interface IGrid
extends java.lang.Iterable<Vector2>
    Contract defining a standard grid

        Compute a new direction based on a given position in the grid and a given direction
        Parameters:

      • hasCellAt

        boolean hasCellAt(Vector2 position)
        Returns true if there's a cell at the given position.
        Parameters:
        position - the coordinates to check in the grid
        Returns:
        true if a black cell can be found at the given position, false otherwise.
